articles.title: Performances Given in Pyongyang and Local Areas
articles.content:
Performances Given in Pyongyang and Local Areas
Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Art performances were given in Pyongyang and local areas on the occasions of the 18th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 92nd birth anniversary of anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 Performances were given by artistes of art troupes in Pyongyang at its theatres and halls.
					
					 The revolutionary drama "Three Pretenders", immortal classical masterpiece created by President Kim Il Sung during the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, was staged at the State Theatre.
					
					 Artistes of the State Symphony Orchestra gave a concert at the Moranbong Theatre. Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as piano concerto "Cantata to Comrade Kim Jong Il", orchestras "General on a Galloping White Horse" and "Unforgettable Echoes over Lagoon Samil".
					
					 The State Folk Art Troupe gave a performance at the Central Youth Hall while the orchestra of the Yun I Sang Music Institute performed at the Yun I Sang Concert Hall.
					
					 Physical acrobatics "Seesaw and Swinging", comedic acrobatics "Congratulations" and animal acrobatics "Bear Rope Jumping" and other numbers were staged at the Pyongyang Circus Theatre.
					
					 Similar performances took place at theatres in North and South Hamgyong Provinces, North Hwanghae Province and South and North Phyongan Provinces and other local areas.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students were held in different parts of the country on Thursday to celebrate the 18th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 The venues of dancing parties in Pyongyang were crowded with youth and students who are full of pride and honor of demonstrating their youthful wisdom and courage in the drive to build a great prosperous and powerful nation under the leadership of the great brilliant commander of Songun.
					
					 The parties kicked off with the playing of song "Let's Sing of Our Pride in Being under the Guidance of the General".
					
					 Their participants danced to the tune of songs praising the greatness of Kim Jong Il, who has pursued the unique Songun policy to defend Korean-style socialism and provide the invincible national strength, elevating the festive atmosphere.
					
					Enthusiastically dancing amid the playing of such songs as "Push Back the Frontiers of Science" and "Higher and Faster", they hardened their will to open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012 by pushing back the frontiers of science and dashing like the wind towards the world under the leadership of 
						Kim Jong Il.
					
					 On the same day, similar parties were arranged in provincial seats and cities and counties.

articles.title: Tribute to Kim Jong Suk Paid
articles.content:
Tribute to Kim Jong Suk Paid
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the bust of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese heroine, at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong on Thursday on the occasion of her 92nd birth anniversary. 
					 Seen standing before the bust was a wreath sent by Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were senior party, army and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, leading officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the KPA, people from all walks of life and school youth and children in Pyongyang. 
					
					 Laid before the bust were wreaths in the name of the WPK Central Committee, the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and the DPRK Cabinet, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, KPA units, educational, public health and media organs, the Joint National Organization of the Korean Children's Union, party and power organs, factories and farms in Pyongyang. 
					
					 Meanwhile, the military attache corps here laid a wreath and the chief and staffers of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front placed bouquets before her bust.
					
					 Floral baskets were placed before her statues standing in Kim Jong Suk County and Hoeryong City and at Kim Jong Suk Naval University and Kim Jong Suk General Military Academy on the same day.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Leadership Goes in Succession All Year Long
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Leadership Goes in Succession All Year Long
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- December 24 is the 18th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army. 
					On this occasion the servicepersons and people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are looking back upon the feats he performed in inspecting tens of army units this year.
					
					 Entering the New Year he visited a tank division honored with the title of the O Jung Hup-led 7th Regiment and offered congratulations to its tankmen, before he inspected several units under the Artillery Command of the KPA to see gun firing drills full of invincible spirit and power. And he spent the army day in the headquarters of a unit with its servicepersons.
					
					 One day he congratulated pilots of an air force unit on their successful trainings and another day he warmly greeted seamen of a combined navy unit coming back from the sea after watching their maneuvers.
					
					 When he visited the command of a combined unit he instructed its officers to pay a primary attention to ideological work, and when he inspected the command of a division stationed in the east of the front he said that all the units should learn from the example shown by the unit in having built residential quarters suitable for the life of revolutionary army officers and introduced methane gas devices into all the new houses.
					
					 Various military universities including Kim Il Sung Political University were also visited by him and received important tasks they should fulfill in training backbones of the KPA. The culture of the army in the Songun era has further developed with art performances of soldiers, families of servicepersons and art groups of different army units appreciated by him. 
					
					 He met with soldier builders who performed feats in socialist construction and participants in the meeting of exemplary frontline soldiers of the KPA and the meeting of active non-commissioned army officers to have photos taken with them.
					
					 Indeed, thanks to the energetic Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il over the army all year long, the dignity of the country and sovereignty of the nation have been guaranteed definitely and the socialist system of Korea has become an invincible fortress.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk, Ardent Devotee of Leader's Ideas
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk, Ardent Devotee of Leader's Ideas
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk set a great example in absolutely following and thoroughly carrying out President Kim Il Sung's revolutionary ideas and line.
					 In the period of the building of a new society she visited many places of the country including factories, farm villages, schools and nature-remaking construction sites without rest for the implementation of the line advanced by the President as regards the building of the Party, state and army.
					
					 In December Juche 34 (1945) she visited the destroyed Chongjin Iron Works (now the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex). She implanted the revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu, the spirit of self-reliance, in the mind of the workers, saying if they had the same spirit as the anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters displayed in making Yanji bombs themselves with bare hands in mountains to defeat the Japanese imperialists, they could rehabilitate the works.
					
					 When she called on a garage in the central part of Pyongyang in 1947, she told the workers to the following effect: We have lack of many things. So, we have to make things we haven't and economize things we have, overcoming difficulties, to build a new prosperous country as soon as possible.
					
					 In those days, she also visited the then Pyongyang Silk Mill, the then Kangson Steel Plant, the Puryong Metallurgical Plant, the Komusan Cement Factory and other factories and enterprises, giving a practical example in upholding the leader's ideas and line.
					
					 The Korean army and people have successfully frustrated ceaseless  provocations and blockade by the U.S.-led imperialists, as they have possessed the spirit of defending the leader devotedly and the revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu, following the example shown by her.
					
					 In the Songun era the country has witnessed many priceless achievements including the large-scale field rezoning of socialist cooperatives, long-extending gravity-fed irrigation waterways and change of farm villages into socialist fairyland. It owes all of them to the immortal feats of the heroine, who made the Korean army and people strong in faith and steadfast in defending the leader.
					
					 The whole army and people, as desired by her, will realize the cause of building a great, prosperous and powerful nation without fail under the guidance of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, holding high the banner of defending the leadership of the revolution at the cost of their lives.

articles.title: Historic Mementoes Exhibitive of Kim Jong Suk's Feats
articles.content:
Historic Mementoes Exhibitive of Kim Jong Suk's Feats
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- A large number of servicepersons, working people, youth and schoolchildren have visited the Korean Revolution Museum to mark the 92nd birth anniversary of anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 On display in several rooms of the museum are lots of materials and historic relics showing her revolutionary feats.
					
					 Seen in Room No. 16 are her favorite pocket pistol and an enameled iron pan with two bullet holes.
					
					 The holes in the pan were made in the Hongqihe battle in March Juche 29 (1940) when she was luring the enemy away from the headquarters of the revolution to protect President Kim Il Sung from danger.
					
					 The pistol is an award the President gave to her in recognition of her meritorious service in the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 With the pistol, she defended the leadership of the revolution at the cost of her life and valiantly fought for the liberation of the country.
					
					 On view in other rooms are photos of the heroine working hard for the building of a state in accordance with the line laid down by the President, a sewing machine, chima and jogori (Korean skirt and jacket), handbag, wrist watch, etc. she used after the liberation of the country.
					
					 Exhibited in the hall named "Leader and Comrades-in-arms" are a plain iron pot she used to prepare meals for the President in days of the anti-Japanese armed struggle, her favorite scarf and other mementoes and photos.
					
					The exhibits provide the visitors with a good knowledge of the undying feats of Kim Jong Suk, who set an example in devotedly defending the leader.

articles.title: "Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works" Off Press
articles.content:
"Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works" Off Press
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House brought out "Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works" Vol. 85, a library of the immortal Juche idea, which systematically and comprehensively deals with his works in a chronological order.
					 It contains 33 works of President Kim Il Sung including his historic speeches, conclusions and talks between January and July in Juche 76 (1987).
					
					 It crystalizes the outstanding ideas, theories and policies set forth by him for socialist economic construction and national reunification and accomplishment of the cause of global independence.
					
					 The President in his work "Let Us Accelerate Socialist Economic Construction by Giving Full Play to the Revolutionary Spirit of Self-Reliance" sets forth the main tasks for implementing the Third Seven-Year Plan and called for bringing about a fresh surge in the economic construction by displaying the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and fortitude.
					
					 Indicated in the works including "On Some Tasks for Easing Strain on Railway Transport", "On Some Problems Arising in the Preparations for Farming and in the Economic Work for This Year" and "On Improving Labor Administration and Developing Local Industry" are tasks facing different sectors of the national economy and ways to implement them. 
					
					 The President in his works including "Answers to Questions Raised by the President of the Prensa Latina News Agency of Cuba" and "Korean Residents in Japan Should Dynamically Struggle for the Prosperity of the Homeland and Independent Reunification of the Country" clarifies the principled stand of the Workers' Party of Korea on the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and ways for developing the movement of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 In such works as "Let Us Develop South-South Cooperation" and "Talk to the Delegation of the Zimbabwean Parliament" he clarifies the principled issues which serve as guidelines for the non-aligned and other developing countries in their struggle to build an independent new society and defend world peace and security.
					
					 The book also contains works giving perfect answers to the theoretical and practical issues arising in the revolution and construction such as the issue of strictly adhering to the Juche character and the principle of historicism in excavating and reconstructing historical remains and relics.

articles.title: Anniversary of Assumption of Supreme Commander Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Assumption of Supreme Commander Observed
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- All the servicepersons and people should wage a more dynamic struggle to bring earlier victory in the drive for building a thriving nation, cherishing the great honor of having General Secretary Kim Jong Il at the top post of the party, the state and the revolutionary armed forces, say leading newspapers Thursday in editorials carried on the occasion of the 18th anniversary of his assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 The assumption of the supreme commandership of the KPA by Kim Jong Il perfectly possessed of the qualification and trait as an iron-willed commander from long ago opened a very bright future of the Korean revolution which was started and has emerged victorious with arms and helped the DPRK demonstrate its dignity as an ever-victorious power with the might of Songun, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 He has boosted the self-reliant defence capability with the KPA as the hardcore in every way, putting the dignity and position of the country and the nation on the highest level. This is shining as the feats to be specially recorded in the history of building an invincible state.
					
					 He has achieved the single-minded unity of all the servicepersons and people. This is a great historic feat which helped the DPRK throw its rays as an invincible power forever.
					
					 Kim Jong Il has shown all sorts of paternal loving care for the servicepersons and people, regarding the idea of believing in the people as in Heaven as his absolute maxim and deeming it the greatest pleasure to find himself among them. There are so many legendary anecdotes about his love for them that even tens of millions of books are not enough to write about all of them. 
					
					 He has powerfully aroused the ideological and moral power of the army and people of the DPRK, making the shouts of hurrah for victory in the drive for opening the gate of a thriving nation ring loudly on this land. This is an immortal feat to shine long in the nation's history.
					
					 It is thanks to his leadership that the revolutionary soldier spirit is prevailing throughout the country, the "Huichon Speed", a new Chollima speed, was created and the DPRK has greeted the era of a great leap forward characterized by dramatic changes.
					
					 Minju Joson says:  No force on earth can block the revolutionary advance of the army and people of the DPRK advancing with Kim Jong Il at the top post of the revolutionary armed forces. The DPRK's just cause is sure to triumph.

articles.title: DPRK Important Day Marked
articles.content:
DPRK Important Day Marked
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Lectures, book and photo exhibitions and film shows were held by the Secretariat of the Pan-African Movement and in Brazil, Bangladesh, Mongolia and Iran from Dec. 15 to 17 on the occasions of the 18th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 92nd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese heroine.
					 Displayed in the venues of the functions were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, photos on their exploits and books and photos introducing the true picture of Songun Korea.
					
					 Speeches were made at the functions. 
					
					 Jose Reinaldo Carvalho, international secretary of the Central Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party, referred to the fact that the Korean people have won only victories undeterred by the vicious moves of the U.S. and its followers to stifle the DPRK. This is entirely thanks to the single-minded unity of all the people in the DPRK around their leader, something more powerful than nuclear weapons, he added.
					
					 N. Sarantuya, member of the Leadership Council of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, said that the world in the 1990s followed the DPRK, assuming that socialism there would also collapse, but thanks to the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il the Korean people defended socialism and achieved marvelous successes in all fields.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the International Taekwon-Do Association of Iran noted that Kim Jong Suk protected Kim Il Sung by displaying matchless self-sacrificing spirit in the period of the anti-Japanese struggle and remained true to his cause of nation-building till the last moments of her life.
					
					 Though she passed away, the exploits performed by her for the Korean revolution and the cause of the women's emancipation will last forever, he stressed.
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched Korean films "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation" and "Arms of Korea".

articles.title: Solidarity with Songun Cause Expressed in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Solidarity with Songun Cause Expressed in Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, released a statement on December 19 on the occasions of the 18th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the 92nd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese heroine.
					 He said in his statement that by holding Kim Jong Il, invincible and iron-willed commander, in high esteem as its supreme commander the KPA has grown to be invincible anti-imperialist revolutionary armed forces and a staunch defender of the destiny of the nation and the cause of socialism.
					
					 He continued:
					
					 The heroic struggle of the army and people of the DPRK leading the confrontation with the U.S. gives great encouragement and hope to progressive mankind.
					
					 We extend firm solidarity to the Songun cause of the DPRK, expressing the belief that the army and people of the DPRK will achieve shining victory in their drive to build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Funciones artisticas en distintas localidades por el 24 de diciembre
articles.content:
Funciones artisticas en distintas localidades por el 24 de diciembre
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar en esta capital y las localidades las funciones artisticas dedicadas al 18o aniversario del nombramiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y al 92o aniversario del nacimiento de la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk.
					 En los teatros y las casas culturales capitalinos se realizaron las funciones de las entidades artisticas centrales.
					
					 En el Teatro Nacional de Drama se llevo a la escena el drama revolucionario "Tres en pugna por el trono" que reproduce la obra maestra creada en persona por el Presidente Kim Il Sung durante la lucha revolucionaria antijaponesa.
					
					 En el concierto de la Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional realizado en el Teatro Moranbong se pusieron en la escena diversas piezas, entre otras, el concierto para piano "Al camarada Kim Jong Il", las musicas orquestales  "General corre a caballo blanco" e "Inolvidables ecos en el lago Samil".
					
					Mientras tanto, el Conjunto Nacional de Arte Tradicional y la Orquesta del Instituto de Musica Yun I Sang actuaron en la Casa Central de la Juventud y la Casa de Musica Yun I Sang, respectivamente.
					
					 En el Circo de Pyongyang se pusieron a ejecucion las piezas acrobaticas, entre otras, la corporal "La tabla y el columpio", la comica "Felicitamos", el circo de animales "Oso jugando a la comba", etc.
					
					 Los espectaculos fueron representados tambien en los teatros locales como los de las provincias de Hamgyong del Sur y del Norte, de Hwanghae del Norte y de Phyong-an del Sur y del Norte.

articles.title: Bailes en distintos lugares de Corea
articles.content:
Bailes en distintos lugares de Corea
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 24 en distintos lugares de Corea los bailes de los jovenes y estudiantes en conmemoracion del 18o aniversario del nombramiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					Varios lugares capitalinos estan llenos de los jovenes y estudiantes con la dignidad y  orgullo que manifiestan inteligencias y valentias de su juventud en la construccion de la gran potencia prospera bajo la guia del Dirigente, gran insigne Comandante del Songun.
					
					Cuando resonaba la melodia de la cancion "Cantemos el orgullo de tener al General" se inicio el baile conmemorativo.
					
					Los participantes bailaron al compas de las canciones que elogian la noble personalidad del Dirigente quien con la original politica de Songun defendio el socialismo a estilo coreano y preparo el invencible poderio nacional.
					
					Mientras resonaban las canciones "Que conquiste la tecnica de punta", "Mas alto, mas rapido", etc. ellos bailaron apasionadamente demostrando la firme decision de correr a todo galope hacia el mundo conquistando la tecnica de punta  para abrir en el ano 2012 las puertas a la gran potencia prospera bajo la direccion del Dirigente. 
					
					Ese dia, semejantes actos se efectuaron en las cabeceras provinciales, las ciudades y los distritos.

articles.title: Rinden homenaje a Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Rinden homenaje a Kim Jong Suk
 Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 92o aniversario del natalicio de la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk, fueron depositadas el dia 24 ofrendas florales ante su busto en el Cementerio de Martires Revolucionarios del monte Taesong.
					 En ese lugar se veia la ofrenda floral enviada por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					 En la ceremonia de homenaje estuvieron presentes los cuadros del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios directivos de los organos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, las organizaciones de masas, los ministerios e instituciones centrales, oficiales y soldados del EPC, trabajadores de distintos sectores, jovenes y ninos escolares en la capital. 
					
					 En la ocasion se colocaron las ofrendas florales en nombre del CC del PTC, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC, el Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, las organizaciones de masas, los ministerios e instituciones centrales, las unidades del EPC, los organos de los dominios de educacion, salud publica, prensa e informacion, el conjunto nacional de Organizaciones de la Union de Ninos de Corea, los organos del partido y el Poder, las fabricas y granjas en la ciudad de Pyongyang.
					
					Por otra parte, el Cuerpo de Agregados Militares en Corea coloco una ofrenda floral; el representante y otros miembros de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang, los ramos de flores.
					
					El mismo dia, las ceremonias de homenaje tuvieron lugar tambien ante las estatuas de bronce de la Heroina erguidas en el distrito Kim Jong Suk, la ciudad de Hoeryong, la Academia de Fuerzas Navales             Kim Jong Suk y la Escuela General de Oficiales   Kim Jong Suk.

articles.title: Un ano lleno de la direccion del Songun de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Un ano lleno de la direccion del Songun de Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 24 de diciembre en que el Dirigente
					 Kim Jong Il fue nombrado como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea recuerdan las hazanas de su direccion sobre el ejercito, que llega a decenas de veces tan solo para este ano.
					Con motivo del Ano Nuevo de 2009, el Dirigente visito una division de tanques laureada con el titulo de Septimo Regimiento de O Jung Hup para felicitar a los oficiales y soldados del EPC e inspecciono en varias veces las unidades subordinadas a la comandancia de artilleria del EPC donde vio el ejercicio de tiro de canones de los militares dispuestos de la voluntad de aniquilar a los enemigos y de la capacidad de implacable golpe. Tambien, estuvo en la comandancia de una unidad donde celebro el dia de fundacion del EPC junto con los oficiales y soldados del EPC.
					
					Felicito el exito de los ejercicios de los pilotos de una unidad de las fuerzas aereas que se preparan firmemente como combatientes capaces de luchar lanzandose como una bomba en el cielo, vio los ejercicios moviles conjuntos de la unidad combinada de las fuerzas navales capaces de frustrar a tiempo cualquier agresion de los enemigos y envio el cordial saludo a los marineros quienes regresan al puerto.
					
					Cuando visito a la comandancia de una unidad combinada, hizo prestar primordial atencion a la labor ideologica, y al inspeccionar la comandancia de una division situada en la parte oriental del frente tomo las medidas para que todas las unidades del EPC aprendan activamente a los militares de esta division quienes formaron ordenadamente las manzanas de las viviendas como las de los oficiales del ejercito revolucionario y realizaron por completo la gasificacion de metano en estas viviendas.
					
					Visito varias academias militares incluyendo la Academia Militar Politica Kim Il Sung donde presento las tareas programaticas que se presentan para formar a los pilares nucleares del ejercito popular e hizo florecer mas la cultura de militares de la epoca del Songun viendo las funciones de los militares, las esposas de los oficiales y otras entidades artisticas del ejercito.
					
					Se reunio con los constructores militares quienes realizaron hazanas laborales en la construccion socialista y los participantes en la Conferencia de los Activistas de Soldados de la Vanguardia del EPC y la Conferencia de los Activistas de los Suboficiales en Servicio de Reenganche de todo el ejercito y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					Gracias a tal dinamica direccion del Songun, se defienden firmemente la dignidad del pais y la soberania de la nacion y el regimen socialista de Corea brilla como invencible baluarte.

articles.title: Periodicos elogian las proezas del Dirigente Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Periodicos elogian las proezas del Dirigente Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ATCC) -- En los editoriales publicados hoy en homenaje al 18o aniversario del nombramiento del Dirigente        Kim Jong Il como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los periodicos capitalinos enfatizan que todos los oficiales y soldados del ejercito popular y el pueblo de Corea deben luchar con mas vigor por adelantar el triunfo de la causa de construccion de la gran potencia prospera guardando en el corazon el gran honor de tener al Dirigente en el cargo supremo del partido, el Estado y las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias.
					 El periodico Rodong Sinmun senala que gracias al nombramiento del Dirigente, quien poseia desde hace mucho tiempo perfectas cualidades y rasgos de general insigne de acero, como Comandante Supremo del EPC, se abrio un horizonte amplio y prometedor en el camino de la revolucion coreana iniciada y triunfada con las fuerzas armadas y nuestra patria pudo exaltar su dignidad como potencia que sale siempre victoriosa con el poderio del Songun.
					
					 El Dirigente llevo al plano cimero la dignidad y la posicion de la patria y la nacion fortaleciendo por todos los medios el poderio de autodefensa nacional, cuyo nucleo es el ejercito popular, lo cual deviene su proeza digna de ser registrada con brillantez en la  historia de construccion de la invencible potencia.
					
					La unidad monolitica de todo el ejercito y el pueblo, que fue alcanzada por el, deviene su gran proeza historica que permite a Corea ser siempre una potencia invencible.
					
					 Lo que le complace mas al Dirigente, quien tiene como su maxima de vida la idea de Iminwichon (considerar al pueblo como cielo), es estar con los militares y los habitantes.
					
					 No bastarian ni decenas de millones de libros para anotar las anecdotas de su calido amor paternal por los soldados y los habitantes.
					
					 Deviene la inmortal proeza que se transmitira siempre en la historia de la nacion coreana el hecho de que el Dirigente hizo repercutir en el territorio patrio las "!Vivas!" de victoria, que senalan la llegada a las puertas a la gran potencia prospera, avivando la potencia ideo-espiritual del ejercito y el pueblo.
					
					 Bajo su sabia direccion, todo el pais se armo con el espiritu revolucionario de los militares, se creo la nueva velocidad Chollima, "la de Huichon", y Corea acogio la epoca de gran salto en que acontecen gigantescos cambios.
					
					 El periodico Minju Joson enfatiza que en este mundo no existe ninguna fuerza que pueda detener la marcha revolucionaria de nuestro ejercito y pueblo, que avanzan teniendo al Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el maximo cargo de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias, y es definitivo el triunfo de la causa justa de ellos.
